app.name: Shop Quoter
app.description: Gift box quoting and proposal tool with AI-assisted pricing, Quebec tax calculations, and evidence-first audit trails.

hero.title: Professional Quoting,
hero.subtitle: Create tiered proposals, calculate Quebec taxes automatically, and track every decision with an evidence-first audit trail powered by AI.

features.title: Everything You Need to Quote Smarter
features.subtitle: Built for gift box businesses that demand accuracy and speed
features.smartQuotingDesc: Create tiered proposals (Budget / Standard / Premium) with automatic Quebec GST/QST calculations and margin tracking.
features.aiPricingDesc: Leverage AI-powered pricing suggestions with full audit trail and governance review for every pricing decision.
features.auditTrailDesc: Every quote transition produces hash-chained audit entries for IRAP compliance and complete decision traceability.
features.marginAnalyticsDesc: Real-time margin tracking with configurable floor gates per org, ensuring profitability on every quote.
features.clientManagementDesc: Organize clients, track quote history, and build lasting relationships with CRM-integrated workflows.
features.bulkImportDesc: Import product catalogs, client lists, and pricing data from CSV/Excel with validation and conflict resolution.

mission.title: Quoting with Confidence
mission.description: Shop Quoter empowers businesses to create accurate, professional proposals in minutes. With AI-assisted pricing, automatic tax calculation, and evidence-first audit trails, every quote tells a trustworthy story.
mission.highlight: Built in Quebec for Canadian commerce.
